episodes.title: Ep. 6 - So... We Were in a Cult.
episodes.description:
We open up for the first time about how we got involved in a high-control religious group known for preaching about “God the Mother.” While they call themselves a church, many former members — including us — recognize the red flags and cult-like tactics used to recruit, isolate, and control.

We’re not diving into the deepest parts of our story just yet, but this episode is about how it all started. How we got pulled in, what the church promised us, and the first signs that something wasn’t right.

This is the beginning of a much bigger conversation about spiritual abuse, indoctrination, and healing. Whether you’ve been through something similar or are just curious how something like this can happen — we’re here to talk about it, honestly and openly.

🔔 Don’t forget to subscribe for future episodes.

👇 Drop your thoughts, questions, or your own story in the comments.
